lead_paragraph: The Huntington Hotel is for sale, but because it has slipped a bit in presentation and because of conditions put on the sale, finding a buyer might not be easy.
snippet: The Huntington Hotel is for sale, but because it has slipped a bit in presentation and because of conditions put on the sale, finding a buyer might not be easy.

headline.main: Family Is Selling Huntington Hotel, Nob Hill Fixture, but Allure Is Faded
headline.print_headline: Family Is Selling Huntington Hotel, Nob Hill Fixture, but Allure Is Faded
